about_the_game:
The full soundtrack to THERE IS NO SLEEP composed by Matt McGreevy! All in a nice package for your ears to enjoy.

(But it might be better if you've played the game first)

Tracks:

01 - "There's Always Been Demons"

02 - "The Storm Is Outside"

03 - "Nightmares, Nightmares, NIGHTMARES!"

04 - "The Pentagram On The Floor"

05 - "Lucidère"

06 - "There Is No Sleep."

07 - "Avahrus"

08 - "The Gauntlet"

09 - "Giving Up Already?"

10 - "Something's Off Here..."

11 - "His Office"

12 - "Did You Think It'd Be That Easy?"

13 - "The Chaos Is Everywhere!"

14 - "It's The Nightmare Demon."

15 - "You're A Dreamer"

16 - "You Did It!"

17 - "Backstabbing Bitch"

18 - "Lucifer...?"

19 - "You Thought They Were DEAD?!"

20 - "THEY. WILL. PAY."

21 - "What Have You Done?"

22 - "It's An Ending, At Least"

23 - "The Crystals AREN'T Just A Currency?!"

24 - "Save Your Dreams, Or Else..."

(Album art by Joseph and Matt McGreevy)
